mapper.insert: INSERT INTO total_order (cust_id, addr_key, item_key, order_date, recipient_name, recipient_phone, order_req, order_status, order_card, order_total_price, order_shoot_num) VALUES (#{custId}, #{addrKey}, #{itemKey}, #{orderDate}, #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone}, #{orderReq}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderCard}, #{orderTotalPrice}, #{orderShootNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE total_order SET cust_id = #{custId}, addr_key = #{addrKey}, item_key = #{itemKey}, order_date = #{orderDate}, recipient_name = #{recipientName}, recipient_phone = #{recipientPhone}, order_req = #{orderReq}, order_status = #{orderStatus}, order_card = #{orderCard}, order_total_price = #{orderTotalPrice}, order_shoot_num = #{orderShootNum} WHERE order_key = #{orderKey}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(order_total_price), 0) FROM total_order WHERE DATE(order_date) = CURDATE()
SELECT order_status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM total_order WHERE DATE(order_date) = CURDATE() GROUP BY order_status
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(order_totalprice), 0) FROM total_order WHERE order_status IN ('결제완료', '배송중', '배송완료')
SELECT i.item_name AS itemName, COUNT(*) AS salesCount FROM total_order o JOIN item i ON o.item_key = i.item_key GROUP BY o.item_key ORDER BY salesCount DESC LIMIT 10
